name: Dark Ice Scream: Horror Night
description:
The best horror story continues! A scary story of a boy in Dark Ice Scream Town. Help him escape and save his life!

Ice scream Man has captured the grandpa this time! Follow the most terrifying story ever and save the Dark Town from evil Ice Scream man. Purpose for this is to forward all the capabilities of ice scream to grandpa for human destruction.
You have to save yourself and the town from evil power of ice cream man

Solve the mistery of suspense adventures and escape safe of all this madness!

Have a great time with ice cream man… but remember, you need to be more clever than ever!

In this game you'll find:
- Escape room mistery action game
- Horror stories to have fun!
- You can choose and take your decissions on the story to custom your experience
- Save the Dark Town neighbours from evilness!

Have fun!
